odase

Interface Model

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HedwigModel, ModelReadOnly, ModelUpdate, SwrlModel, ValidatableModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompareTwoKnowledgeBase, ConcurrentKnowledgeBase, KnowledgeBase, ModelAdaptor, ModelWrapper, RefModel

    public interface Model
extends SwrlModel, HedwigModel, ValidatableModel
    Instances of this interface represent the state of some OWL+SWRL model. The methods in this interface are called by the API generated by the Hedwig tool.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getLabel(Resource instance, Locale locale)
      Retrieve the value of the rdfs:label property for the given instance in the language of the given locale.
      String getLabel(Resource instance, RdfSubstitution subst, Locale locale)

      • Methods inherited from interface odase.ValidatableModel

        validate

    • Method Detail

      • getLabel

        String getLabel(Resource instance,
                Locale locale)
        Retrieve the value of the rdfs:label property for the given instance in the language of the given locale. This method should never return null. It should make up a label if no suitable rdfs:label property value is found.

      • getLabel

        String getLabel(Resource instance,
                RdfSubstitution subst,
                Locale locale)
